---

### Pre-release checks
              - [ ] Code has been reviewed and approved
              - [ ] All tests are passing
              - [ ] Documentation has been updated
              - [ ] Change log is accurate
              
              ### Release tasks
              - [ ] Version bump is correct
              - [ ] Dependencies are up to date
              - [ ] Release notes are complete
